heading: This Afternoon
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of snow showers west of the Green Mountains. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30 south and in the Champlain Valley, low to mid 20s elsewhere north. Southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph west of the Greens.

heading: Tonight
text: Cloudy. Periods of snow, with 1 to 3 inches, up to 5 inches in the Green Mountains and St. Lawrence Valley; snow could be briefly heavy. Lows from the mid teens to lower 20s, except single digits to lower teens in far northern New York. Southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, becoming northwest late.

heading: Thursday, New Year’s Day
text: Chance of early snow showers west of the Greens, likely east, then diminishing; otherwise clouds decreasing, doing so slowly northeast, with scattered mountain snow showers continuing there, before diminishing in the afternoon. Early highs from the single digits to mid teens north, and upper teens to mid 20s in the south, then temperature steady of falling. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.
